definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: Which looks kinda cool in my humble opinion.
sentences.chinese: 依我拙见，这看起来有一些酷。

sentences.english: Due to the circumstance, writer announce opinion by myself.
sentences.chinese: 针对这种情况笔者发表了拙见。

sentences.english: At last, I give some advice on China's securities regulatory issues.
sentences.chinese: 文章最后还对我国的证券监管问题提出了一点拙见。

sentences.english: It is simply mind boggling to contemplate the future of education on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 这只是我对未来互联网教育的拙见。

definition: lit. throw out a brick and get jade thrown back (idiom)/fig. to attract others' interest or suggestions by putting forward one's own modest ideas to get the ball rolling
to just talk for the sake of talking
to venture to/to presume to/to take the liberty of
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
(humble expr.) of humble talent and shallow learning (idiom); Pray forgive my ignorance,...
lit. a brick thrown to prompt others to produce a jade (idiom)/fig. a modest suggestion intended to prompt others to come forward with better ideas
to point out mistakes or weak points for correction/to comment/criticism
